body:
Remember back when leftists promoted sexual promiscuity around the clock and worked double extra hard to convince everyone that traditional sexual morality was somehow wrong?

They didn't do this because they wanted "free love." They did this because they had to destroy the existing positive paradigm before they could replace it with a horribly negative one.

Well they've moved on from "If it feels good...do it" to Orwell's Junior Anti-Sex League. The only kind of "sex" they promote is buggery and carpet munching, with pederasty waiting in the wings.

Human beings who have normal sexual interests which are correctly regulated will marry and start families. These families create children who grow up to be functional adults.

Functional adults is the last thing that leftists want to see. They want broken and damaged people to help them create hell on earth.

Remember when AntifaBLM proclaimed the destruction of families as one of their goals?

Not a coincidence.

body: It's my thought is they've got these kids all so screwed up about sex, they're afraid to make any move.  On the one hand their lives have been inundated with sexual perversion through their devices, which in the long run, decreases sexual drive because they've become de-sensitized, on the other hand, their sexuality is called in question from every angle. Are you gay, bi'? Do you wanna try?  How does a poor kid navigate this garbage?

body: Why do you think society has always been so protective of women around men and so distrustful of men around women? The rules against males having contact with females go back ages. It's because people naturally perceive men as violent and sexual predators. This is partly because men do have uncontrollable sex drives, but the vast majority don't rape; the reason they still get seen as evil is because male faces are evil. First impressions dictate a lot more of our perception than we think, and male faces are designed to be ugly and mean looking as to scare away potential threats, so people look at them as threatening even when their actions prove otherwise. Female faces have the opposite, looking beautiful and innocent to attract empathy, hence why people have always been so much more lax on women even when they're just as capable.

First impressions dictate a lot more of our perception than we think, and male faces are designed to be ugly and mean looking as to scare away potential threats, so people look at them as threatening even when their actions prove otherwise. Female faces have the opposite, looking beautiful and innocent to attract empathy, hence why people have always been so much more lax on women even when they're just as capable.

body:
You are aware that women on college campuses are being carefully taught to see every man as a rapist, right?

You are aware of the nonsense fake statistic that the enemy is peddling which claims that 1 in 5 female college students get rape, right?

You are aware that every romantic interaction between men and women on college campuses is being portrayed as rape unless the woman is continuously expressing consent the entire time, right?

This was not the case 30 years ago, and I doubt it was the case even 10 years ago.

The enemy wants to destroy families, and they are working to do this by attempting to destroy romantic relationships between men and women.

body:
> You are aware that women on college campuses are being carefully taught to see every man as a rapist, right?

I do too, even though I know I shouldn't. It's a built-in instinct. And this isn't new, why do you think society has always been so protective of girls around boys? Parents don't like their daughters going out with boys, everywhere has rules limiting boys' contact with girls (even more so in the olden days than now), etc. People have never trusted males because the females are more valuable and it's in our instincts to protect them as much as possible. This is the one disadvantage women have in society, overprotection. Other than that the majority of them are pampered as hell and can get whatever they want by crying about it.

> You are aware that every romantic interaction between men and women on college campuses is being portrayed as rape unless the woman is continuously expressing consent the entire time, right?

It's always been this way. Boys' contact with girls is probably more lax and permitted than it's ever been.

The enemy wants to destroy families, and they are working to do this by attempting to destroy romantic relationships between men and women.
